subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
 
My name is Mrs. Bong Ja.
There is something very important that I want to discuss with you.
I'm a very lonely woman, but sick and dying.
 
I'm suffering from severe malignancy and have a few more months to live.
I am sending you this message because I want to donate some money to you, for charity and investment purposes in your country.
 
Get back to me so that I can send you more details about my donation (
bongja4798@gmail.com
)
 
Warm Regards,
Mrs. Bong Ja.

subject: Re:   Hello,
body:
Hello Mrs. Bong Ja,

I'm sorry to hear about your health condition. It's very kind of you to think about donating money for charity and investment purposes. Can you please provide more details about how you would like to proceed with the donation?

Best wishes,
April

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello April,

I'm glad to receive your message. Thank you for your reply. I'm sorry if my
reply arrived late. My health is not stable, so I find it difficult to
write to you earlier. I promise you that you will not regret this day
knowing that your heart is pure and sincere.
I contacted you faithfully after looking for a reliable and trustworthy
person I can trust for this great task. I want to donate from a charity
fund so that you can use it to reach the poor and homeless people living in
rural areas, especially in your country.

If you want to help me, then you have to make sure I do what I want you to
do.
You have to assure me and promise me that a portion of the Fund will be
used to finance the poor, orphanages, widows and charities in your country.
You can use the rest to help yourself and invest in any profitable business
that can bring annual income that will allow you to help charity annually.
I have no more than two months to live, and this is my mortal desire. If
you honour my wish then my soul will be at peace when I finally leave this
world. Meanwhile, the money is $5.5MUSD

If you have any questions about this proposal, please do not hesitate to
ask them and I will be willing to clarify them. Go back to me so I can tell
you what you can get.

I wait patiently for your answer.
Take care of yourself and remain blessed.

Yours sincerely,

Ms. Bong Ja

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I appreciate your trust in wanting to donate to help those in need. Can you please provide more details about the charity fund and how it can be accessed for the intended purpose? I want to ensure that everything is clear before moving forward. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
April

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello April,

Good to read from you indicating your readiness to champion this charity
project work to a successful conclusion. However, I feel it's high time for
me to let you know what will be your entitlement as a reward upon
completion. I want to use this medium to inform you that it is very
possible and easy to carry out this task if only you will give this
proposal the attention it all deserves.
The total value of the fund is 5.5 million dollars. I wish that 50% of this
money be used to establish a charity home, where the less privileged in
society can be catered to and it should be in your country so that it would
be very easy for you to handle. You will be entitled to 30% as compensation
for your inputs/efforts in securing these funds over to your end. while the
remaining will be used on a lucrative investment depending on your
directives or advice on this.

There's nothing serious or complicated there to undergo than for you to
adhere strictly to all my instructions so that you will not make any
mistakes.


You will be required to provide the following information for legal
documentation which will enable the automatic bequeath of funds to you as
the acclaimed foreign beneficiary:

Full names:
Full address:
Profession:
Company's name(if any):
Telephone No:
Nationality:
A valid copy of your ID:

Do provide the above-stipulated information for immediate implementation of
the needed legal works regarding this affair.
Thanks,

Mrs. Bong Ja

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Mrs. Bong Ja,

Thank you for reaching out to me about this charity project. I appreciate the opportunity to potentially be involved in such a meaningful cause. Could you please provide more details about how the funds will be secured and transferred for the establishment of the charity home? Additionally, what specific steps do you need me to take in order to move forward with this initiative?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
April

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello April,

You need to send me the details I asked from you so that I can send you the
document and the contacts details of the Bank where the money has been
deposited. I wait to hear from you soon.

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about the document and the bank details. Could you please provide me with some more information on how this process works?

Best wishes,
April

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello! I'm interested in receiving the details from you. Could you please provide more information about the document and the bank where the money has been deposited? I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
April

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello April,

I need to have your full details before sending the contact details of the
Bank so that you can write and ask for the process to follow.
Thanks,
Bong Ja

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Bong Ja,
Thank you for reaching out. I'd be happy to provide my details. What information do you need from me in order to proceed with sharing the contact details of the bank?
Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
April

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello April,

Below are the details I need.

Full names:
Full address:
Profession:
Company's name(if any):
Telephone No:
Nationality:
A valid copy of your ID:

Thank you,

Bong Ja

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Bong Ja,
Thank you for reaching out. Could you please provide more information about the company you are referring to? I would be happy to help if I can.

Best wishes,
April

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello April,

Nice to hear from you again. In my last message to you, the company I am
referring to is if you have any company and what is the name of the
company. Please get back to me as soon as you have read my message with the
details needed.
Thanks,
Bong Ja

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Bong Ja,
Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your interest in my company. The name of my company is XYZ Enterprises. What specific details would you like to know about it?
Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
April
